column2: The Gabelli Global Utility & Income Trust, is a non-diversified, closed-end management investment company. The Company’s investment objective is to seek a consistent level of after-tax total return and to obtain on tax-advantaged dividend income. The Company invests at least 80% of its funds in equity securities and income producing securities, such as governments of domestic and foreign companies involved in the utilities industry and other industries. The Company’s fund's portfolio composition includes sectors, such as energy and utilities, telecommunications, cable and satellites, food and beverage, wireless communication, water, electronics, natural gas utilities, electric transmission and distribution, financial services, natural resources and consumer products.
